testcase.classname: User logins to Campaign Links Front End
testcase.name: Campaigns Links Login
testcase.system-out: Given User opens login page of the Campaigns link...........................passed When user enters "webmaster@shakedeal.com" and "Sh@kede@l@123"..............passed And Clicks On SignIn........................................................passed Then user should be able to login to Campaign links.........................passed

testcase.classname: Feature to add Points to User Links
testcase.name: Add Points To User links
testcase.system-out: Given User opens login page of the Campaigns link...........................passed When user enters "webmaster@shakedeal.com" and "Sh@kede@l@123"..............passed And Clicks On SignIn........................................................passed Then user should be able to login to Campaign links.........................passed And user clicks on Automation Campaign......................................passed Then Click on Reward Automation link........................................passed

testcase.classname: User logins to Reward Links Front End
testcase.name: Reward Links Login
testcase.system-out: Given User opens login page of the reward link..............................passed When user enters otp "1000".................................................passed And Clicks On Continue......................................................passed Then user should be able to login to rewad links............................passed

testcase.classname: User wants to view redeemed vouchers
testcase.name: Verify My Vouchers
testcase.system-out: Given User opens login page of the reward link..............................passed When user enters otp "1000".................................................passed And Clicks On Continue......................................................passed Then user should be able to login to rewad links............................passed And Clicks on My Vouchers...................................................passed Then User can view all redeemed vouchers....................................passed
